name: Open-Graphtheory.org

screenshots.caption: A sudoku solved by the coloring algorithm
Path from Berlin to Munich (the red edges are hard to see)
Coloring of a (simplified) map of the german highway system
A vertex-cover in the map of germany

short_description:
Open Source C++ Framework for Graphtheory.

The main focus of this Framework lies on fast Algorithms for NP-Complete problems. We aim at providing algorithms that run Fixed Parameter Tractable algorithms (utilizing Kernelization where possible), Tree-Width based, Randomized Algorithms, etc. in parallel.

So the aim of the project is to give you simple interfaces to the best algorithms for these problems.
